changeSet.author: Lukasz Wyszomirski
Adrian Winkler
Michal Dudzinski
changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS admin_document_acc_action_mix; CREATE TABLE admin_document_acc_action_mix ( admin_doc_acc_action_mix_id integer auto_increment, account_action_id smallint not null, admin_document_id integer not null, created_by smallint, create_date date, updated_by smallint, updated_date date, version_no integer, PRIMARY KEY (admin_doc_acc_action_mix_id), foreign key (account_action_id) references account_action(account_action_id) on delete no action on update no action, foreign key (admin_document_id) references admin_document(admin_document_id) on delete no action on update no action )

changeSet.author: Lukasz Wyszomirski
Jakub Podeszwik
changeSet.sql: update account m inner join loan_account l on m.account_id = l.account_id inner join account p on p.account_id = l.parent_account_id set m.account_state_id = p.account_state_id where m.account_state_id != p.account_state_id;

changeSet.author: Jakub Podeszwik
changeSet.sql: UPDATE loan_schedule ls1 INNER JOIN loan_account la ON ls1.account_id = la.account_id INNER JOIN loan_schedule ls2 ON ls2.account_id = la.parent_account_id SET ls1.action_date = ls2.action_date WHERE ls1.installment_id = ls2.installment_id;

changeSet.author: Kamil Kalfas
